price: Se les mostrarán las obras malas que cometieron, y el castigo del que se burlaban los rodeará.
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā kasabū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
